## Public Member Functions

### EmitSchedule() {#a16c498db76eb73d37731b36c18879ee4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineBasicBlock &#42; ScheduleDAGLinearize::EmitSchedule (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp; InsertPos)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
EmitSchedule - Insert MachineInstrs into the MachineBasicBlock according to the order specified in Sequence.

EmitSchedule - Emit the machine code in scheduled order.

Return the new InsertPos and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> that contains this insertion point. ScheduleDAGSDNodes holds a BB pointer for convenience, but this does not necessarily refer to returned BB. The emitter may split blocks.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagfast-cpp/#l00660">660</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagfast-cpp">ScheduleDAGFast.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
